answers.answer: You might get more responses if you post this on a mental health forum, rather than a Diabetes forum.

question: I was diagnosed w/ Major Depression and an eating disorder 20 years ago and have been on Antidepressants ever since.  Does anyone know of a good top-rated Antidepressant I can take that does not cause weight gain.  I recently got back on Wellbutrin - 300 mg, but feel I need a little more of something.  Was on Cymbalta but had to go off of it because I was sleeping to much when I was taking it.  I was sleeping way to much.  Felt like I was sleeping my life away on the Cymbalta.  But it did help immensly.
title: Major Depression
